name: Sub Rush
description:
This game is made within 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2020:
https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/sub-rush-2

Play as a submarine adventure who crashes into the bottom of the ocean! Repair your submarine and make your way up to the surface.
Be aware though, your submarine isn't 100% functional, and there are sharks around the area!
Controls:
Submarine Mode:
Spacebar - Use Main Thruster
A,D - Use Side Thrusters
E - Exit Submarine
Diver Mode:
Spacebar - Repair (Hover over the broken part and mash that button!)
WASD - Swim
E - Enter Submarine
Cheats:
F12 - Quick Repair
